articles.title: Global CO2 emissions from fossil fuels to rise by less than 1% this year as renewables and EVs take off - CNN
articles.description: The modest increase comes despite widespread concerns of a rush back to coal, oil and gas amid a global energy crunch.
articles.content:
Finally, some good news in the battle against greenhouse gasses: Carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions from the burning of fossil fuels are on track to rise less than 1% this year.
